EmailTemplate.name: Honeywell Partner Summit Prague 2015.Honeywell Partner Summit Prague 2015 Regist
EmailTemplate.subject: Honeywell Regional Partners Summit
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Customer}}
Your registration for the Regional Partners Summit in Prague, CZE has been received.
If you are able to attend, I look forward to welcoming you to the event on 24th March. If you require any further information about the event, the agenda or venue, please do not hesitate to contact me directly.
If you are unable to attend but would like further information on our range of products and services, please do not hesitate to contact me, and I would be delighted to arrange a separate meeting.
Ali Sadoudi B&GA Sales Director
Honeywell Aerospace
